title: 魔改问题
author: Ka_Dong
txt_content: 如何魔改神秘和无尽贪婪的合成表，还有植物魔法祭坛的合成表  版本1.7.10

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
植物魔法魔改看https://crafttweakertool.rligry.com/
无尽贪婪的魔改例子：
删除合成
mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.remove(<avaritia:skullfire_sword>);复制代码
添加合成
mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped("SKULLFIRESWORD", <avaritia:skullfire_sword> * 1, [[null, null, null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>], [null, null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:1>],[null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null],[null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null],[null, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null, null],[null, null, <extrabotany:material:8>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:block_resource>, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, null, null, null, null],[null, <avaritia:block_resource>, null, null, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, null, null, null],[<avaritia:endest_pearl>, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null]]);
复制代码
神秘的不知道
